imdb: On Election Day Springfield is buzzing. Jeffrey is performing well in the polls and Blake fears she will lose her campaign for mayor. Olivia keeps reliving the night all those years ago in San Cristobel when a young man raped her. She is reeling from the news that the young man she knew back then is actually Jeffrey! Blake surges ahead in the election and she is named Springfield's new mayor. During her acceptance speech, Blake collapses and is rushed to Cedars Hospital. Someone has poisoned her. Perhaps they discovered Blake's actions these past few months as the "Springfield Burns" blogger. A fact the Marina and Remy discover as they search for clues as to who may have poisoned her.
